commit.message: Implement strict types across the codebase: Added `declare(strict_types=1);` to all relevant files and updated function signatures with type hints and return types for improved type safety and code reliability.
Update build configuration: Upgrade PHP to 8.2, add Node.js setup, and update Vite to version 7.1.2; modify versioning information in version.php
Update build process: Add version update functionality and increment build number; modify layout styles for better visibility
Enhance contact management UI: Added titles and improved button labels for edit and delete actions in database.php. Updated database.db.

Refactor data analysis and chart functionality

- Updated data-analysis.php to streamline CSV file handling and remove unnecessary processing logic.
- Added new chart.php page for visualizing data from CSV files, including configuration options for chart type and columns.
- Implemented AJAX endpoints for fetching CSV data and summaries, enhancing performance and user experience.
- Created chart.js and data-analysis.js for managing chart generation and data analysis interactions.
- Improved user interface with loading indicators and error handling for better feedback during data processing.
- Updated sitemap.php to include the new chart page.

Add debug joke page and AJAX functionality for testing

- Created debug_joke.php for testing joke fetching functionality.
- Implemented buttons to test fetchJoke, jQuery, and AJAX calls.
- Added debug information display for troubleshooting.
- Developed joke_debug.php to provide a debug version of the joke fetching process.
- Included error handling and loading indicators for AJAX requests.
- Enhanced user experience with visual feedback during joke fetching.
Add comprehensive CI/CD pipeline documentation for PHPDocSpark, detailing GitHub Actions and Azure DevOps workflows, build processes, and troubleshooting guidelines.

Enhance PrismJS integration and resolve JavaScript errors

- Updated PrismJS code block enhancement documentation with detailed error resolution steps and implementation details.
- Improved doc_lookup_file_by_slug function to prevent false matches and ensure file existence before returning.
- Added debug scripts for document mappings, directory structure, and SEO URL generation to facilitate troubleshooting.
- Created a test page for verifying PrismJS implementation and ensuring no console errors occur.
Update SEO and security configurations; add Security.md for comprehensive safety information

Add comprehensive tests for MarkdownProcessor functionality

- Introduced inline HTML test to validate handling of various HTML elements within Markdown.
- Implemented processor status page to monitor health, performance metrics, and cache operations.
- Created runtime error test to ensure proper error handling and initialization of the MarkdownProcessor.
- Developed tests for code blocks, including PHP, JavaScript, and CSS, to verify syntax highlighting and rendering.
- Conducted security validation tests to check for XSS protection and path traversal vulnerabilities.
- Enhanced tests for PrismJS integration to ensure proper class assignment for code blocks.
- Verified functionality with real document content to ensure accurate Markdown processing.
Add Cloudflare Redirect Troubleshooting Guide with solutions and best practices

Refactor Overview.md for clarity and enhanced project description; remove SEO.md; add comprehensive SEO strategy to Project/SEO.md; document Azure routing fix with GitHub Copilot in new AZURE_ROUTING_FIX.md; establish best practices for Copilot instructions in copilot-instructions-best-practices.md; minor UI adjustments in article_list.php.

Refactor Nginx configuration and startup script for improved PHP handling

- Updated nginx.conf to listen on port 8080 and streamline PHP processing.
- Simplified location blocks and removed unnecessary custom routing.
- Enhanced fastcgi parameters for better compatibility with PHP-FPM.
- Modified startup.sh to use official Microsoft approach for applying custom nginx configuration and reloading the service.
Add startup script for PHP applications and custom Nginx configuration

Update project references and add articles list page

- Changed URLs and repository references from controlorigins to markhazleton in various markdown and PHP files.
- Updated live demo and source code links in Overview.md and Project Overview.md.
- Added new articles list page to display technical articles from an RSS feed.
- Implemented filtering and searching functionality for articles.
- Enhanced SEO metadata and navigation to include the new articles section.
Enhance project data fetching by implementing remote URL retrieval with error handling; add debug script for testing
Refactor GitHub Actions workflow to streamline composer install check and update artifact upload path
Update PHP version to 8.0 in composer.json and workflow; set license to MIT
Add or update the Azure App Service build and deployment workflow config
Update package version to 1.2.0 in package-lock.json; enhance web.config with security headers and formatting improvements
Add .vs directory to .gitignore and remove slnx.sqlite file
Refactor URL construction for document view redirection in index.html

Fix: Enhanced client-side routing for Azure App Service 404 issues

- Improved index.html routing to properly convert /doc/ URLs to file parameters
- Added path-to-file conversion logic for proper document routing
- Enhanced debugging and console logging for troubleshooting

This should resolve the nginx 404 issues by handling routing client-side
before requests reach the problematic Azure App Service nginx config.
Add versioning system with automated build information; update Azure pipeline and configuration files
Enhance JavaScript routing in index.html for better URL handling; update Parsedown.php method signatures to support nullable parameters
update configuration for custom error pages
Implement custom 404 handler and JavaScript routing for Azure App Service; update Azure pipeline configuration
Update PHP version to 8.4 in Azure pipeline and composer configuration
Enhance Azure App Service configuration with custom routing and diagnostics; add URL handler for pretty URLs

Add configuration files for PHP custom routing on Azure App Service

- Created AZURE_ROUTING_FIX.md for detailed setup instructions.
- Added .htaccess for Apache URL rewriting rules.
- Created appsettings.json for application settings.
- Added diagnostics.php for troubleshooting routing issues.
- Implemented startup.sh to ensure .htaccess is present and configured.
- Added web.config for IIS URL rewriting rules and server settings.
Update dependencies in package.json and package-lock.json; modify button style in document_view.php

Add debugging scripts and documentation utilities

- Introduced multiple debugging scripts to examine document mapping, pretty URLs, and selection logic.
- Implemented centralized documentation utilities for slug generation and file lookup.
- Enhanced SEO configuration and structured data generation for better search engine visibility.
- Created a sitemap generator to improve site indexing.
- Added a robots.txt file to manage crawler access.
- Developed a routing mechanism for pretty URLs in the PHP built-in server.
- Included tests for dropdown behavior, exact flow simulation, and routing logic.
- Improved handling of URL encoding and decoding for better user experience.

chore: add configuration files for linting and formatting tools

- Created .lintstagedrc.json for lint-staged configuration to run ESLint, Prettier, Stylelint on staged files.
- Added .prettierignore to exclude specific files and directories from Prettier formatting.
- Introduced .prettierrc.json to define Prettier formatting rules and overrides for different file types.
- Established .stylelintrc.json with custom rules and ignored files for Stylelint.
- Implemented eslint.config.js with recommended settings and custom rules for JavaScript files.
- Added comprehensive documentation in Project Overview.md detailing the purpose, features, architecture, and usage of the Control Origins Documentation & Demo Application.

Add CRUD functionality for contacts and GitHub API testing script

- Implemented a complete CRUD interface for managing contacts using SQLite in `database.php`.
- Added functions for creating, reading, updating, and deleting contacts.
- Included a seeding function to populate the database with Star Trek characters.
- Created a user-friendly HTML interface for contact management with Bootstrap styling.
- Added a testing script for GitHub API calls in `test_github_api.php` to validate responses and check for errors.

Enhance fetch_joke.php with error handling and data validation

- Improved cURL function to include error handling for connection issues.
- Added checks for JSON decoding and API errors to provide user-friendly messages.
- Sanitized output to prevent XSS vulnerabilities.
- Updated comments for clarity on functionality.

Enhance project list and search functionality with improved UI and features

- Refactored project_list.php to group projects by first letter, add search functionality, and implement pagination.
- Improved UI with Bootstrap components, including filters and enhanced card layout for project display.
- Updated search.php to provide detailed search results with file metadata, context excerpts, and improved user experience.
- Created a new layout.php file for consistent styling across pages, including a responsive navbar and footer.
- Introduced datatable.php for reusable DataTable component with export capabilities and responsive design.
